arts.ttl: Man City confirmed XI vs. Huddersfield: Haaland absent as Guardiola makes nine changes
arts.sum: Manchester City confirm their starting lineup for tonight’s EFL Cup third-round tie against Huddersfield Town at the John Smith’s Stadium.

arts.ttl: Port Vale v Arsenal, Huddersfield v Manchester City, and more: Carabao Cup – live
arts.sum: ⚽ League Cup third round updates, from 7.45pm BST ⚽ Live scores | Read Football Daily | And email Scott The fourth round of the League Cup has already served up some marvellous entertainment. Diego Gomez’s long-drive-heavy four-goal haul; two fine assists for Federico Chiesa and the daftest of red cards for Hugo Ekitiké; a first win of the season for Wolves; Lincoln forcing Chelsea to dig deep; third-tier Cardiff’s win at Burnley. It’s all been happening, with the promise of more fun to come. Tonight’s card is short but sweet … Huddersfield Town v Manchester City (7.45pm) Newcastle United v Bradford City (7.45pm) Port Vale v Arsenal (8pm) Tottenham Hotspur v Doncaster Rovers (7.45pm) Continue reading...

arts.sum: Man City aiming to stretch their unbeaten run to four games across all competitions

arts.ttl: Man City fans are sure ‘incredible’ 18-year-old similar to Kevin De Bruyne will debut vs Huddersfield
arts.sum: He looks like a star in the making!

arts.ttl: Manchester City will rest players against Huddersfield Town.
arts.sum: Given the injuries that City are currently dealing with, it is likely that several of Manchester City’s young and talented academy players will be given an opportunity to impress tomorrow night. Pep Guardiola has said that City’s academy players will likely be given an opportunity to play against Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: Guardiola gives confirmation ‘it will be a mix’ in his selection against Huddersfield
arts.sum: But that target must not come at the cost of his management of minutes, and he has confirmed he will "mix" the lineup for the Carabao Cup third round fixture against Huddersfield Town on Wednesday evening. After winning the Carabao Cup four times in a row from 2018 until 2021, the team have fallen far short of a return to the final in the next four, failing to go further than the quarter-final.

arts.ttl: Five Man City youngsters who could play vs Huddersfield include two famous sons as Erling Haaland injured

arts.ttl: Huddersfield vs Manchester City predictions: Citizens to avoid giant-killing
arts.sum: Tom Hill is backing Manchester City to overcome Huddersfield Town in an entertaining Carabao Cup third-round tie on Wednesday evening.
